name: The Paper (MonadoBoy64)
description:
The Paper is a Newspaper Puzzle Game made for the Melrose Game Jam 2022. The game involves going level to level fixing images or finishing the headlines of newspapers from various decades before the time runs out.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Click Objects and Click Buttons

Esc: Pause

Right Mouse Button: Rotate Images

Melrose Game Jam 2022 Theme: Decades

Uses of the Melrose Center: Game Development Lab, Editing Bay B, and Music Keyboard

Credits:

Nicholas Walton: Game Design, Level Design,  Art, Animation, Programming, Music, and SFXs

Special Thanks: Luluca Walton, Alex Walton, Juan Rivera, Melrose Center, and the Orlando Public Library
